FileSystemRead_getWorkingDirectory.name: FileSystemRead_getWorkingDirectory
FileSystemRead_getWorkingDirectory.returns: The full path of the working directory on the filesystem

FileSystemRead_setWorkingDirectory.name: FileSystemRead_setWorkingDirectory
FileSystemRead_setWorkingDirectory.description:
Set the working directory. The dir argument may be an absolute filesystem path, otherwise relative to the current working directory.
If the dir starts with / it will first be checked as an absolute directory, then as relative path to the working directory.

FileSystemRead_getFileContentsRecursivel.name: FileSystemRead_getFileContentsRecursively
FileSystemRead_getFileContentsRecursivel.description: Returns the file contents of all the files under the provided directory path

parameters.name: dirPath
parameters.description: The directory to return all the files contents under

FileSystemRead_getFileContentsRecursivel.returns: The contents of the file(s) as a Map keyed by the file path

FileSystemRead_getFileContentsRecursivel.name: FileSystemRead_getFileContentsRecursivelyAsXml
FileSystemRead_getFileContentsRecursivel.description: Returns the file contents of all the files recursively under the provided directory path

parameters.name: dirPath
parameters.description: The directory to return all the files contents under

parameters.name: storeToMemory
parameters.description: If the file contents should be stored to memory. The key will be in the format file-contents-<FileSystem.workingDirectory>-<dirPath>

FileSystemRead_getFileContentsRecursivel.returns: The contents of the file(s) in format <file_contents path="dir/file1">file1 contents</file_contents><file_contents path="dir/file2">file2 contents</file_contents>

FileSystemRead_searchFilesMatchingConten.name: FileSystemRead_searchFilesMatchingContents
FileSystemRead_searchFilesMatchingConten.description: Searches for files on the filesystem (using ripgrep) with contents matching the search regex.

parameters.name: contentsRegex
parameters.description: The regular expression to search the content all the files recursively for

FileSystemRead_searchFilesMatchingConten.returns: The list of filenames (with postfix :<match_count>) which have contents matching the regular expression.

FileSystemRead_searchFilesMatchingName.name: FileSystemRead_searchFilesMatchingName
FileSystemRead_searchFilesMatchingName.description: Searches for files on the filesystem where the filename matches the regex.

parameters.name: fileNameRegex
parameters.description: The regular expression to match the filename.

FileSystemRead_searchFilesMatchingName.returns: The list of filenames matching the regular expression.

FileSystemRead_listFilesInDirectory.name: FileSystemRead_listFilesInDirectory
FileSystemRead_listFilesInDirectory.description:
Lists the file and folder names in a single directory.
Folder names will end with a /

parameters.name: dirPath
parameters.description: The folder to list the files in. Defaults to the working directory

FileSystemRead_listFilesInDirectory.returns: The list of file and folder names

FileSystemRead_listFilesRecursively.name: FileSystemRead_listFilesRecursively
FileSystemRead_listFilesRecursively.description: List all the files recursively under the given path, excluding any paths in a .gitignore file if it exists

FileSystemRead_readFile.name: FileSystemRead_readFile
FileSystemRead_readFile.description: Gets the contents of a local file on the file system. If the user has only provided a filename you may need to find the full path using the searchFilesMatchingName function.

parameters.name: filePath
parameters.description: The file path to read the contents of (e.g. src/index.ts)

FileSystemRead_readFile.returns: The contents of the file(s) in format <file_contents path="dir/file1">file1 contents</file_contents><file_contents path="dir/file2">file2 contents</file_contents>

FileSystemRead_readFileAsXML.name: FileSystemRead_readFileAsXML
FileSystemRead_readFileAsXML.description: Gets the contents of a local file on the file system and returns it in XML tags

parameters.name: filePath
parameters.description: The file path to read the contents of (e.g. src/index.ts)

FileSystemRead_readFileAsXML.returns: The contents of the file(s) in format <file_contents path="dir/file1">file1 contents</file_contents>

FileSystemRead_readFilesAsXml.name: FileSystemRead_readFilesAsXml
FileSystemRead_readFilesAsXml.description: Gets the contents of a list of files, returning a formatted XML string of all file contents

parameters.name: filePaths
parameters.description: The files paths to read the contents of

FileSystemRead_readFilesAsXml.returns: The contents of the file(s) in format <file_contents path="dir/file1">file1 contents</file_contents><file_contents path="dir/file2">file2 contents</file_contents>

FileSystemRead_fileExists.name: FileSystemRead_fileExists
FileSystemRead_fileExists.description: Check if a file exists. A filePath starts with / is it relative to FileSystem.basePath, otherwise its relative to FileSystem.workingDirectory
FileSystemRead_fileExists.returns: True if the file exists, else false
